item.title: The Formation of the Scientific Mind, Gaston Bachelard - part 1
item.description: Quotes about science The concept of epistemological obstacle The first obstacle: the primary experiment General knowledge as an obstacle An example of verbal obstacle: the sponge Aside on education Sick burns These are notes from my reading of La formation de lâ€™esprit scientifique by Gaston Bachelard. I hesitated a bit but finally decided to write the notes in English. In the end this blog is as much a place to save things I want to remember as a place to practice writing in English and share with other people.
